product_name: The North Face Class V Racerback Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Power through the longest hikes, toughest runs or longest paddles wearing The North Face Class V racerback tank top for women. Soft and streamlined, it has a shelf bra for a little extra support. The North Face Class V racerback tank top for women is constructed of a soft, stretch fabric with treatment to prevent water absorption and speed overall drying time. Fabric provides UPF 50+ protection from UV light. The T-strap back allows full range of motion. Flat-locked stitching throughout reduces chafing. Closeout.
short_description: Power through the longest hikes, toughest runs or longest paddles wearing The North Face Class V racerback tank top for women. Soft and streamlined, it has a shelf bra for a little extra support.
